name: MPM Sandbox Tech Demo
description:
This is an early tech demo of a particle based simulator I am working on. You can run around in a world made of particles and shoot particles as well as apply an attraction force on the particles.

This is one of my first times publishing something on itch.io so please let me know if you have any problems installing or running it. Thanks!

System requirements:

Recommended (my system)Minimum (not tested)OSWindows 10 64-bitWindows 7 SP1 64-bit
CPUIntel Core i7-8700KSSE2 SupportGPU
RTX 2080DirectX11 SupportRAM 16GB 4GB
